subject: Traffic Accidents and Safety
Track and Field
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: The former University of Georgia 400-meter standout and Team USA member Torrin Lawrence died Monday in a car accident as he made his way home to Jacksonville, Fla. He was 25.
snippet: The former University of Georgia 400-meter standout and Team USA member Torrin Lawrence died Monday in a car accident as he made his way home to Jacksonville, Fla. He was 25.
